questions.text: I find that I brainstorm best by discussing my ideas with others
I take every opportunity I can to catch up with friends
I feel comfortable speaking in front of large crowds
I find it thrilling to meet new people
I find it easy to be vulnerable with others
After a long day, I often need to recharge by watching TV, reading a book, or playing video games
I don't mind going to a museum or nice restaurant on my own
I find it more important to give clear instructions than big-picture context
I find I'm most productive when I make a to-do list for the day
